name: C.S.S. CITADEL VR
description: Are you ready to survive and escape from the C.S.S. CITADEL?
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Processor: i5 or higher Memory: 12 GB RAM Graphics: GTX 970 Storage: 1 GB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: windows 10 Processor: i7 Memory: 16 GB RAM Graphics: GTX 980 Ti Storage: 1 MB available space
